page.title: 20CHEMICAL WORKS
page.content: {Britag Chemical Works. { The building is approx. 100 years old and has been owned by 4 companies. It started as a farming company and in the 1960's it was taken over by ACC. In 1965 it was taken over by a firm called Albright & Wilsons and then in 1983 by ICI. The most dangerous chemical they use is liquid ammonia. It has to be kept in a cool container. If it escapes anybody in it's path will find it hard to breathe. Safety procedures at the factory include having their own fire brigade,first aid centre and ammonia incident teams.
